Shared Layout (_Layout.cshtml)

The main layout template that provides the common structure for all pages in the application.

Overview

This layout defines:

  • HTML document structure
  • Common CSS and JavaScript includes
  • Navigation bar
  • Sidebar menu
  • Footer
  • Alert/notification areas

Usage

All views in the application inherit from this layout by default. The layout can be specified explicitly in a view using:

@{
    Layout = "_Layout";
}

Sections

  • Title: Page title override
  • Styles: Additional CSS includes
  • Scripts: Additional JavaScript includes
  • Content: Main page content

ViewData/ViewBag Properties

  • Title: Page title
  • ActiveMenu: Current active menu item
  • UserName: Logged in user's name
  • Notifications: Alert messages

Features

  • Responsive design
  • Bootstrap 5 integration
  • Font Awesome icons
  • jQuery and custom JavaScript
  • Dynamic navigation highlighting
  • User session information display
  • Notification system integration
  • Edit this page
